channel.title: Help with ::starter please!

item.title: Help with ::starter please!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Hi, I am trying to make it so that a player can only type ::starter once!

This is what i have so far.

if (command.startsWith("starter") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(995, 30000000); addItem(392, 3000); sendMessage("Dupe is autoban or IP Ban!");

Can someone help me?

Read full topic
